structure.description: App shell for Healthcare Patient Portal. Manages global layout, auth session, patient profile, feature flags, accessibility preferences, and real-time updates.
structure.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Secure top header showing brand, patient identity, security status, global search, quick actions, notifications, and user menu. Requires: patientProfile{name,avatar,dob,MRN,primaryProvider}, authSession{token,roles,expires}, notificationsSummary, quickActionsConfig, searchIndexConfig.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI AppBar examples with navigation patterns, active states, and responsive behavior. Include examples for different menu structures and styling. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.

children.description: Portal brand logo; alt text from brand assets. Requires: brandAssets{logoUrl,alt}.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Avatar examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Patient identity capsule with privacy controls. Requires: patientProfile; privacySettings(maskSensitive).
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Patient avatar image with initials fallback. Requires: patientProfile.avatar or initials.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Avatar examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Patient full name text; masked if privacy toggle on. Requires: patientProfile.name.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Typography examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: MRN/Patient ID badge; supports copy-to-clipboard with tooltip. Requires: patientProfile.MRN.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Chip examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Privacy toggle to mask/unmask sensitive fields in header.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Switch/Toggle examples for a privacy visibility toggle with ARIA labels, controlled state, and change events. Include keyboard interactions, form integration, and disabled states styling.

children.description: Security status indicator with session timer and 2FA state. Requires: authSession{expires,2FA}.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Badge examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Global portal search scoped to appointments, records, meds, and billing. Requires: searchIndexConfig, patientId.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Autocomplete/SearchBox examples for a global search with async suggestions, custom item templates with icons, and keyboard navigation. Include debounce, minLength, loading indicator, and aria-live for results.

children.description: Quick actions: Schedule Appointment, New Message, Refill Request. Each opens a modal.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Toolbar examples with navigation patterns, active states, and responsive behavior. Include examples for different menu structures and styling. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.

children.description: Schedule Appointment (primary) opens scheduling modal.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button examples for primary call-to-action with icon and click handler opening a modal. Include loading state and disabled when permissions forbid.

children.description: Compose new message to care team.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button/IconButton examples with tooltip for opening message compose modal. Include badge support for unread counts.

children.description: Medication refill request.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button with danger/warning styling for refill request, with confirmation dialog pattern.

children.description: Notifications bell with unread count and dropdown list. Requires: notificationsSummary.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Dropdown/Popup + Badge examples to build a notifications bell with async list, infinite scroll, and item templates. Include keyboard and focus management.

children.description: User menu with Profile, Settings, Help, Logout. Requires: userMenuItems, authSession.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Menu/DropDownButton examples for a user account menu with icons, separators, and logout action. Include accessibility patterns and custom header template.

children.description: Main two-column layout: collapsible navigation sidebar and main content area. Responsive behavior: sidebar overlays on mobile.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Primary navigation with patient snapshot and sections for Dashboard, Appointments, Medical Records, Prescriptions, Billing; plus secondary links. Requires: navigationItems[{id,label,icon,route,badgeCount,permissions}], patientSnapshot, routeState.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Drawer/Sidebar examples for a collapsible navigation with mini mode, selected item highlighting, badges, and responsive overlay on mobile. Include routing integration and ARIA attributes.

children.description: Patient Snapshot mini card. Requires: patientSnapshot{name,MRN,primaryProvider,nextAppointment}.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Card examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button/IconButton examples for toggling a Drawer collapsed state, with tooltip and aria-expanded attributes.

children.description: Main dashboard content area with header bar and responsive grid of widgets. Requires: currentRoute, breadcrumbMap, defaultDateRange.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Dashboard header bar with title, breadcrumbs, date range selector, and refresh.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Card examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Page title 'Dashboard'.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Typography examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Breadcrumbs: Home > Dashboard. Requires: breadcrumbMap.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Breadcrumb examples with custom item renderers and routing integration.

children.description: Date range selector filtering metrics/results. Requires: defaultDateRange.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo DateRangePicker examples with presets (7d/30d/custom), controlled state, and change events to refetch data. Include responsive popup and keyboard navigation.

children.description: Refresh data for all widgets.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button examples with loading spinner and global refresh action across multiple widgets.

children.description: Responsive card grid for dashboard widgets; 1-2 columns on mobile/tablet, 3-4 on desktop. Requires: layout breakpoints.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Grid examples with data binding, sorting, filtering, and pagination. Include examples with realistic sample data, custom cell templates, and responsive design. Provide complete implementation with all necessary props.

children.description: Upcoming Appointments widget card. Requires: appointmentsSummary[{dateTime,location,provider,purpose,status}], checkInEligibility, telehealthLinks.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Card + ListView examples for an appointments summary with item templates, action buttons per row, and empty state. Include skeleton loaders.

children.description: Card title.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Typography examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: List of next 3 appointments with provider, location/telehealth, and status chips.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo ListView examples with custom templates, chips for status, and inline actions.

children.description: Per-appointment actions: Reschedule, Check-in, Join Televisit.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Reschedule opens scheduling flow.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button examples used inside ListView items, with click handlers opening a modal/stepper.

children.description: Check-in enabled only within eligibility window.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button with conditional disabled state and tooltip explaining eligibility.

children.description: Join Televisit launches external link.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button/LinkButton examples with external link icon and safe target handling.

children.description: View all appointments route link.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button as link examples integrated with router for navigation to Appointments page.

children.description: Recent Test Results widget. Requires: recentResults[{name,date,keyValue,flag,unread}], referenceRanges, unreadFlags.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Card + Grid examples for compact recent results with flag coloring and row click opening a details drawer.

children.description: Card title.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI Typography examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Compact table of latest labs/imaging with flag indicators and unread badge.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Grid examples with small dense rows, conditional cell styling for flags (H/L), and row selection to open a drawer.

children.description: Details drawer with interpretation and reference ranges opened on row click.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Drawer/Panel examples used as a side details panel with dynamic content and close button.

children.description: Medication Reminders widget. Requires: medicationList[{name,dose,schedule}], reminderSchedule, adherenceLog, refillEligibility.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Card + List/Checklist examples for medication reminders with mark-as-taken interactions, overdue alerts, and progress feedback.

children.description: Card title.

children.description: Mark as taken with immediate feedback.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button with success state and toast integration on completion.

children.description: Request refill for selected medication.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Button with confirm dialog and disabled when refill not eligible.

children.description: Health Metrics Charts widget with tabs for Vitals, Labs, Activity. Requires: metricsTimeSeries, targets, units, dateRange.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo TabStrip + Charts examples with multiple series, legends, and responsive behavior. Include accessibility for colorblind palettes and tooltips.

children.description: Tabs to switch between Vitals, Labs, Activity.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo TabStrip examples with lazy-loaded tab content and maintain state across navigation.

children.description: Vitals tab with line charts for BP and HR.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI TabStrip examples with navigation patterns, active states, and responsive behavior. Include examples for different menu structures and styling. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.

children.description: Blood pressure trend with systolic/diastolic series, target bands.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Line Chart examples with multiple series, plot bands for targets, and date axis with range selection.

children.description: Heart rate trend with resting vs active overlays.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Line Chart with markers, smoothing, and tooltip templates.

children.description: Labs tab with glucose trend and sparkline of A1C.

children.description: A1C mini trend sparkline.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Sparkline examples for compact trend inside a card with constrained height.

children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Bar Chart examples with categorical axis for days and total label on bars.

children.description: Active minutes line chart with goal line.

children.description: Quick Contact Form widget to message healthcare providers. Requires: providerDirectory, messageDraft, attachmentPolicy, rateLimits.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo Form examples with validation, async submit, and toasts. Include file upload integration and autosave draft pattern.

metadata.description: Comprehensive ACT for a healthcare patient portal with secure header, navigation sidebar, dashboard widgets (appointments, results, meds, charts), quick contact form, billing summary, footer, and global utilities. Includes rich component diversity and targeted MCP queries for Kendo UI integration.
